tweet: I'm grateful for the way blogging, FB, twitter, etc make it possible to think & speak clearly, rather than being bullied by those at the top
#myhrs24 Looking at my avg over wks, I spend less than 2 hrs a day on virtual interactions: FB, twitter, email-only relationships, blogging
#myhrs24 Looking at my avg over wks, I spend 4 or more hours a day giving undistracted face2face attention to people in my life
@dtatusko the thing that frustrates me is that it's not about social engineering from above, but about each of us choosing 4 ourself w care
TwitPoll: Estmt avg hrs daily spent face2face building relationship & avg hrs daily spent here/FB/blogging. Pls RT/use #myhrs24
